title: Finish up a documentation pull request
contents:
mode_edit

完成文件 Pull Requestlink

Finish up a documentation pull requestlink

本主題介紹如何在合併和關閉 Pull Request 後保持工作區的整潔。

This topic describes how to keep your workspace tidy after your pull request is merged and closed.

檢視上游儲存庫的提交日誌link

Review the commit log of the upstream repolink

此過程確認你的提交現在在 angular/angular 儲存庫的 main 分支中。

This procedure confirms that your commit is now in the main branch of the angular/angular repo.

在 github.com 上檢視提交日誌link

To review the commit log on github.com for your commitlink

在 Web 瀏覽器中，開啟https://https://github.com/angular/angular/commits/main。

In a web browser, open https://github.com/angular/angular/commits/main.

  1. 檢視提交列表。

    Review the commit list.

    1. 查詢包含你的 GitHub 使用者名稱、提交訊息和提交的 Pull Request 號的條目。由於提交的合併方式，提交號可能與你的工作分支中的提交不匹配。

      Find the entry with your GitHub username, commit message, and pull request number of your commit. The commit number might not match the commit from your working branch because of how commits are merged.

    2. 如果你看到列出了你的提交，則你的提交已合併到 angular/angular 中，你可以繼續清理你的工作區。

      If you see your commit listed, your commit has been merged into angular/angular and you can continue cleaning up your workspace.

    3. 如果你在列表中沒有看到你的提交，可能需要等待，然後重試此步驟。在你看到包含 origin/main 的日誌條目中或之後列出你的提交之前，請不要繼續清理你的工作區。

      If you don't see your commit in the list, you might need to wait before you retry this step. Do not continue cleaning your workspace until you see your commit listed in or after the log entry that contains origin/main.

    4. 如果你看到包含 origin/main 的日誌條目上方列出了你的提交，那麼你可能需要再次更新 a angular/angular 儲存庫的複製。

      If you see your commit listed above the log entry that contains origin/main, then you might need to update your clone of the angular/angular repo again.

從上游儲存庫更新你的 forklink

Update your fork from the upstream repolink

在你看到 Pull Request 中的提交已合併到上游 angular/angular 儲存庫後，更新你的 fork。

After you see that the commit from your pull request has been merged into the upstream angular/angular repo, update your fork.

此過程會更新你本地計算機上的 personal/angular 複製，然後更新雲中的儲存庫。

This procedure updates your clone of personal/angular on your local computer and then, the repo in the cloud.

使用上游儲存庫更新你的 forklink

To update your fork with the upstream repolink

從本地計算機上的命令列工具執行這些步驟。

Perform these steps from a command-line tool on your local computer.

  1. 從你的工作區目錄，執行此命令以導航到你的工作目錄。請記住將 personal 替換為你的 GitHub 使用者名稱。

    From your workspace directory, run this command to navigate to your working directory. Remember to replace personal with your GitHub username.

    cd personal/angular

  2. 執行此命令以簽出 main 分支。

    Run this command to check out the main branch.

    git checkout main

  3. 執行此命令，以從上游 angular/angular 儲存庫更新本地計算機 working 目錄中的 main 分支。

    Run this command to update the main branch in the working directory on your local computer from the upstream angular/angular repo.

    git fetch upstream git merge upstream/main

  4. 執行此命令，使用上游 angular/angular 儲存庫中的最新內容更新你在 github.com 上的 personal/angular 儲存庫。

    Run this command to update your personal/angular repo on github.com with the latest from the upstream angular/angular repo.

    git push

  5. 執行此命令以檢視 fork 的提交日誌。

    Run this command to review the commit log of your fork.

    本地計算機上的 main 分支和 github.com 上的原始儲存庫現在與上游 angular/angular 儲存庫同步。執行此命令以列出最近的提交。

    The main branch on your local computer and your origin repo on github.com are now in sync with the upstream angular/angular repo. Run this command to list the recent commits.

    git log --pretty=format:"%h %as %an %Cblue%s %Cgreen%D"

  6. 在前一個 git log 命令的輸出中，查詢包含你的 GitHub 使用者名稱、提交訊息和提交的 Pull Request 號的條目。由於提交的合併方式，提交號可能與你的工作分支中的提交不匹配。

    In the output of the previous git log command, find the entry with your GitHub username, commit message, and pull request number of your commit. The commit number might not match the commit from your working branch because of how commits are merged.

    你應該在包含 upstream/main 的日誌條目中或附近找到 Pull Request 中的提交。

    You should find the commit from your pull request in or near the log entry that contains upstream/main.

如果你在正確的位置找到 Pull Request 中的提交，則可以繼續刪除你的工作分支。

If you find the commit from your pull request in the correct place, you can continue to delete your working branch.

刪除工作分支link

Delete the working branchlink

在你確認你的 Pull Request 已合併為 angular/angular 並出現在 fork 的 main 分支中之後，你可以刪除 working 分支。

After you confirm that your pull request is merged into angular/angular and appears in the main branch of your fork, you can delete the working branch.

因為你的工作分支已合併到 fork 的 main 分支中，並且 Pull Request 已關閉，所以你不再需要 working 分支。以防萬一，可能很想保留它，但這可能不是必要的。如果你保留所有舊的工作分支，你的儲存庫可能會收集不必要的混亂。

Because your working branch was merged into the main branch of your fork, and the pull request has been closed, you no longer need the working branch. It might be tempting to keep it around, just in case, but it is probably not necessary. If you keep all your old working branches, your repository can collect unnecessary clutter.

刪除你的工作分支link

To delete your working branchlink

  1. 從你的工作區目錄，執行此命令以導航到你的工作目錄。請記住將 personal 替換為你的 GitHub 使用者名稱。

    From your workspace directory, run this command to navigate to your working directory. Remember to replace personal with your GitHub username.

    cd personal/angular

  2. 執行此命令以簽出 main 分支。

    Run this command to check out the main branch.

    git checkout main

  3. 執行此命令，從本地計算機刪除 Pull 請求中使用的工作分支。將 working-branch-name 替換為你的工作分支的名稱。

    Run this command to delete the working branch used in the pull request from your local computer. Replace working-branch-name with the name of your working branch.

    git branch -d working-branch-name

  4. 執行此命令，從 github.com 上的 personal/angular 儲存庫中刪除工作分支。將 working-branch-name 替換為你的工作分支的名稱。

    Run this command to delete the working branch from your personal/angular repo on github.com. Replace working-branch-name with the name of your working branch.

    git push -d origin working-branch-name

下一步link

Next steplink

刪除上一個問題的工作分支後，你就可以選擇另一個要解決的問題。

After you delete the working branch for your last issue, you're ready to select another issue to resolve.

最後複查時間：10/12/2022
